entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
